references: J. H. Conway et al., ATLAS of Finite Groups, Chapter 2, http://www.math.colostate.edu/~hulpke/lectures/m601/ATLASClip.pdf
F. J. MacWilliams, Orthogonal matrices over finite fields, Amer. Math. Monthly, 76 (1969), 152-164.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..41
F. J. MacWilliams, Orthogonal matrices over finite fields, Amer. Math. Monthly, 76 (1969), 152-164.STATUS
maple: h:=proc(n) local m;if n mod 2 = 0 then m:=n/2;2^(m^2)*mul( 4^i-1, i=1..m);else m:=(n+1)/2;2^(m^2)*mul( 4^i-1, i=1..m-1);fi;end;# This produces a(n+1)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_. Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 30 2008.
extensions: Edited by  _W. Edwin Clark_ et al., Jan 15 2015
